biotools.summary: PRED-TMBB is a tool that takes a Gram-negative bacteria protein sequence as input and predicts the transmembrane strands and the probability of it being an outer membrane beta-barrel protein.  The user has a choice of three different decoding methods.

bioschemas.name: PRED-TMBB
bioschemas.summary: PRED-TMBB is a tool that takes a Gram-negative bacteria protein sequence as input and predicts the transmembrane strands and the probability of it being an outer membrane beta-barrel protein.  The user has a choice of three different decoding methods.
